name: getPresence
description:
Gets the presence status of the users whose IDs or email addresses are given.
OauthScopes: READ_USER

userIds.description: A list of unique user IDs or email addresses of the users you want to query the presence state for

$ul: **dndUntil**: Timestamp until the DND state of the user is active
**isOptedOut**: Indicates whether the user has opted out of their presence
**latitude**: The latitude of the geo location of the user
**locationText**: The geo location of the user in clear text
**longitude**: The longitude of the geo location of the user
**mobile**: Identifies whether the presence state is based on the state information of a mobile device or not
**state**: The presence state of the user. It can be one of the following: AVAILABLE, OFFLINE, AWAY, BUSY, or DND (Do-Not-Disturb)
**statusMessage**: A free formed status message of the user
**timeZoneOffset**: The timezone offset of the user compared to UTC
